indicator_name: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing countries (in watts per capita)
target_name: By 2030, expand infrastructure and upgrade technology for supplying modern and sustainable energy services for all in developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their respective programmes of support
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 7.b
change_notice: This indicator was added following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review. The indicator it replaced has been archived.
